title: Multiple Choice (1 point each)
instructions: Select the best answer for each question.

prompts.question: Which of the following is NOT a part of functional management?
What is the role of Operation Management?
answers: Defines the vision of the company
Day-to-day specifics of getting the job done
prompts.correct_answer: Day-to-day specifics of getting the job done

prompts.question: What type of artist is responsible for creating the art related to the levels the player will inhabit?
Which of the following steps in the Game Development Cycle are in the proper chronological order?
answers: Vertical Slice, Code Lock, Beta, Gold Master

prompts.question: Which of the following likely would NOT be found in a Game Design Document (GDD)?
